title: 'The right time for a change' - Martial tells Man Utd he wants to leave
description: French striker Anthony Martial tells Manchester United that he wants to leave the club.

title: BBC DJ and broadcaster Janice Long dies at 66
description: Long's career spanned five decades and she was the first woman to have her own daily show on Radio 1.

title: Palace boss Vieira absent for Spurs match after positive Covid-19 test
description: Crystal Palace will be without Patrick Vieira for Sunday's match at Tottenham after the manager tested positive for coronavirus.

title: NFL Highlights: 'History on Christmas Day' - Rodgers breaks Packers touchdown record
description: Watch Aaron Rodgers pass Brett Farve to become the Green Bay Packers’ all-time leader in touchdown passes, throwing the 443rd of his career in a 22-16 win over the Arizona Cardinals.

title: Desmond Tutu: UK tributes paid to archbishop
description: Tributes are paid in the UK to Archbishop Desmond Tutu after his death at the age of 90.

title: Dog saved by surgery after chocolate coin feast
description: Staffordshire bull terrier Hugo had eaten six packets of chocolate coins - including all the foil.

title: Covid: Travel misery for tens of thousands as flights are cancelled
description: Chinese and US airlines are hardest hit amid a surge in Covid cases in many countries.

title: Desmond Tutu: South Africa anti-apartheid hero dies aged 90
description: Tributes are paid to Archbishop Tutu, the Nobel peace prize laureate who helped end apartheid in South Africa.

description: The first black archbishop of Cape Town, South Africa, was a much-loved figure around the world.

title: Covid-19: New rules in force for three UK nations
description: Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland bring in limits on socialising while England waits for more data.

title: Richard Osman opens up to Desert Island Discs about food addiction
description: The author and TV host speaks about the "shame" behind his lifelong struggle with overeating.

title: Tan Hill Inn: How snowed-in pub caught world's attention
description: Storm Arwen trapped guests and staff inside Britain's highest pub for three days.

title: The Ashes highlights: Australia dominate sorry England

description: England's batting capitulates again as Australia's dominance of the Ashes series continues on day one of the third Test in Melbourne.

title: Long Covid: 'I have to choose between walking and talking'

description: From hanging with Will Smith in Hollywood to taking a break from selfies in lockdown.

title: Obituary: Desmond Tutu - South Africa's rebellious priest
description: Inspirational cleric and anti-apartheid campaigner who played a major role in the process of reconciliation in South Africa.

title: The Papers: Queen's message of empathy and 'crossbow horror'
description: The front pages report on a "deeply personal" Christmas message and an armed intruder at Windsor.

title: Platinum Jubilee: Pubs could stay open until 1am, home secretary proposes
description: The home secretary wants to extend licensing hours by two hours over June's bank holiday weekend.

title: Deadly bombing at restaurant packed for Christmas
description: Six people have been killed after a suicide bomber targeted a restaurant in eastern DR Congo.

title: Mark Easton's Boxing Day family puzzler 2021

description: Socialites are becoming wary of what they post online in case Kenya's revenue authority comes calling.

title: Love story sends TV fans in search of idyllic Alps
description: Crash Landing On You has been a big hit and now fans are travelling to the filming locations.

description: Claire Foy's latest role shows how a 1960s high-profile divorce was used to "shame" women.

title: Israeli 'psychic' Uri Geller still baffling fans at 75
description: Now wowing visitors at his museum, the famous spoon bender recalls his rise from poverty to stardom.

title: The Chinese mother backing bigger families

title: Why a former oil executive is capping abandoned wells
description: Around the US, an estimated three million oil wells have been abandoned. They're more dangerous than we think.

title: Life inside one of the world's only Stilton makers
description: The Leicestershire dairy is one of only a handful that produces the festive favourite.
